description:
The modern design of the Frontier makes for efficient snow travel and are perfect for exploring trails. Designed for fast, easy removal, the EZ binding system is paired with a lightweight frame and decking that won’t bog you down.

  • Fit-Step™ 2.0 Frame allows for an efficient, natural stride
  • SoftTec™ decking is durable, lightweight, and offers great flotation
  • Recreational crampons provide great grip on firm trails
  • 180™ EZ binding is easy to get in and out of with a single buckle
  • Articulation system maintains a natural foot position and allows lateral flex
name: Tubbs Frontier Snowshoes - Women's
